#Dataset
```{r}
LD<-London_Dataset
```

```{r}
BoroughFreq<-data.frame(table(LD$IncGeo_BoroughName))

f<-ggplot(BoroughFreq,aes(reorder(Var1,+Freq),Freq))
f+geom_col(fill="296d98")+
  coord_flip()+
  xlab("")+
  ylab("Frequency")
```
